aiLab.title: AI Lab
aiLab.description: Send live requests to your configured AI providers. Pick a modality, fill in prompts and parameters, then inspect the raw API response.

sectionDescriptions.llm: Compare different chat models side by side—use the payload template to trigger responses via the /api/ai endpoint.
sectionDescriptions.vlm: Vision-language models will appear here once configured in the model catalog.
sectionDescriptions.text-to-image: Review generation options for image providers such as FAL or WaveSpeed.
sectionDescriptions.image-to-image: Send edit requests for existing imagery—supply the source URLs plus any additional parameters.
sectionDescriptions.text-to-video: Trigger video generation from text prompts using your configured providers.
sectionDescriptions.image-to-video: Animate still images into video clips. Provide the source image URL and fine-tune optional settings.
